name: The Pet Fund
description: Financial assistance for non-basic, non-emergency veterinary care (has waitlist)
fullDescription: The Pet Fund provides financial assistance for non-basic, non-emergency veterinary care to pet owners who cannot afford treatment.
whatTheyOffer:
- Financial assistance for non-emergency vet care
- Help with ongoing treatment costs
- Covers conditions like diabetes, cancer treatment, etc.
- Does NOT cover routine care or emergencies
- Waitlist may apply
howToGetIt:
1. Visit thepetfund.com to apply
2. Complete the application form
3. Provide documentation of financial need
4. Provide veterinary estimate for needed care
5. Wait for approval (waitlist common)
6. If approved, funds sent to veterinarian
keywords: The Pet Fund, vet financial assistance, pet treatment, diabetes, cancer, chronic care, non-emergency, California, afford vet
